code: import UserActionTypes from'./user.types';export var googleSignInStart=function googleSignInStart(){return{type:UserActionTypes.GOOGLE_SIGNIN_START};};export var signInSuccess=function signInSuccess(user){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGNIN_SUCCESS,payload:user};};export var signInFailure=function signInFailure(error){return{type:UserActionTypes.SIGNIN_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var emailSignInStart=function emailSignInStart(emailAndPassword){return{type:UserActionTypes.EMAIL_SIGNIN_START,payload:emailAndPassword};};
